name: Dark (itch) (Ace Savaid)
description:
Made as a first year, fall semester 2021 project for game design at Ontario Tech. 

"You wake up in a dark blue hallway. The hallway seems to stretch on for quite a while." 

A short text based game where you make decisions and see how it ends.
There are multiple endings and a true ending.  This was made in a day and was my first experience using Twine.  I really enjoyed experimenting with it and making this project.
